14.verification_summary: Assessment based solely on the claim text and general knowledge about mitigation practices; no external sources consulted.

15.verification_summary: The claim asserts senior leadership must monitor IT risk and technology programs because IT touches many organizational areas, which is a plausible governance perspective though not backed by specific evidence in the provided text.
